Package co.cask.cdap.api.spark

Defines APIs for defining Spark jobs in CDAP.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JavaSparkMain
    A Java interface for Spark program to implement.
    Spark
    Defines an interface for the Spark job.
    SparkClientContext
    A context for a Spark program to interact with CDAP.
    SparkConfigurer
    Configurer for configuring Spark.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSpark
    This abstract class provides a default implementation of Spark methods for easy extension.
    JavaSparkExecutionContext
    Spark program execution context.
    SparkSpecification
    A default specification for Spark programs

Package co.cask.cdap.api.spark Description

Defines APIs for defining Spark jobs in CDAP. Also provides a custom JavaSparkContext (for Java Spark jobs) and SparkContext (for Scala Spark jobs) which supports reading a Dataset to RDD and writing a RDD to Dataset
